name: Yellow Chair
description: Inject a vibrant touch of modern elegance with this striking yellow armchair. Its clean lines and sunny hue make it a cheerful and sophisticated addition to the room.

name: Coffee Table Duo
description: Bring a touch of natural simplicity to your living area with this set of light wood coffee tables. Their organic shapes and warm tones create a relaxed and inviting atmosphere.

name: Dinner Table
description: Featuring a modern design with a crisp white tabletop and contrasting wooden legs, this dining table is a stylish centerpiece for contemporary dining.

name: Rustic Coffee Table
description: This distinctive wooden coffee table features a textured, open-block design, adding a touch of rustic charm and visual interest to the living space.

name: Cupboard
description: This sleek light wood cupboard offers a blend of minimalist design and practical storage, adding a touch of understated modern elegance to the space.

name: Full Length Mirror
description: With its minimalist wooden frame, this full-length standing mirror adds a touch of understated elegance and functionality to the bedroom.

name: Organic Mirror
description: This striking mirror features a fluid, organic shape framed in warm wood, adding a touch of natural artistry and visual interest to the wall.

name: Cage Chair
description: Crafted with a distinctive string and wood framework, this armchair provides both visual interest and a light, open feel with plush cushions for comfort.

name: Sideboard
description: With its light wood and woven rattan elements, this sideboard brings a relaxed bohemian or coastal feel to the room while offering practical storage solutions.
